name: mrtrix3preproc2sh
label: MRtrix3: 2 Shell Preprocessing Pipeline
description: mrtrix3preproc2sh runs the MRtrix3 preprocessing (dwifslpreproc) pipeline on 2 shell data. It uses FSL's topup with the provided inverse phase encoded data. After preprocessing, filed inhomogeneity bias correction with algo:fsl, and brain mask (bet2) is performed (dwibiascorrect fsl). Required inputs are two forward PE diffusion DICOMs and two corresponding RPE DICOMs.
author: MRtrix, FSL, and Brain-Life teams.

DIFF1.description: Forward Phase Encoded (FPE) Diffusion DICOM Image.

DIFF2.description: Forward Phase Encoded (FPE) Diffusion DICOM Image.

RDIF1.description: Reverse Phase Encoded (RPE) Diffusion DICOM Image.

RDIF2.description: Reverse Phase Encoded (RPE) Diffusion DICOM Image.
